name: happy.vim
description: Happy is a parser generator system for Haskell, similar to the tool `yacc' for C. This script is syntax file for happy files.
install_details:
Put happy.vim in your ~/.vim/syntax or in $VIMRUNTIME/syntax. 
To start using it while editing alex file you can use 
:set syntax happy 
or create/edit script for file type detecting and applying this syntax rules.

versions.release_notes:
' (apostrophe) is now regocnized when part of non-terminal
hightlighting haskell directives
hightlighting todos and fixmes in haskell comments
